colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,(ZHES MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO'I GTOR SGRUB JI LTAR BYA SUL DNGOS GRUB 'DAB STONG 'DZUM PA'I PAD DKAR ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG DAD LDAN DGE LA 'DUN PA RGYUD SMAD SNGAGS RAM PA BYAMS PA BRTZON 'GRUS NAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, NGOS KYI GONG MA KHRI CHEN NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN PAS MDZAD PA'I MGON PO BAR CHAD KUN SEL GYI GTOR SGRUB 'DI BZHIN LAS GSUM RNAM BZHAG GI SNYING PO KUN BTUS SHING, THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I MAN NGAG DU MAS BRGYAN PAS KUN LA NYE BAR MKHO ZHING BYIN RLABS KYI TSAN KHA CHE BA BCAS, DE NYID GZHIR BZHAG LA, LAG LEN, DMIGS RNAM LHA BZHI DRIL SGRUB 'DON CHOG DANG BCAS PAR TSIG SBYOR DANG, SNON DBRI CUNG ZAD BYAS THOG ,'JUG PA BDE BA'I PHYIR LHA BZHI DRIL SGRUB DANG, 'DON CHOG RNAMS ZUR DU BKOL ZHING, ZHI BA DANG DBANG GNYIS KYI 'DON CHAG ,KHA BSGYUR DGOS PA RNAMS MTSAN GYIS GSAL, SPEL TSIG GSAR BSGRIG DGOS PA RNAMS GSAR BSGRIGS DANG, KHA SKONG DGOS PA RNAMS KHA BSKANG STE LHA MCHOG MAH'A K'A LA'I RNAL 'BYOR PA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG YE SHES BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS KYIS SBYAR BAS MCHOG DMAN BAR MA GSUM GYIS 'DON CHOG TZAM LA MA ZHEN PAR PHYAG LEN DMIGS RNAM DANG BCAS PA LA @018B ZHIB TU BRTAG PA GAL CHE'O, ,)
